issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] integrate test utils with arrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4201](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4201). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The following tasks to be addressed as part of this Jira :
1. move (or consolidate) data generators in generate_data.h to arrow
1. move convenience fns in gandiva/tests/test_util.h to arrow
1. move (or consolidate) EXPECT_ARROW_\* fns to arrow
